column1:
Overall Sentiment Over The Years:
Cleaniness: 54.87%-61.40%
Amenities: 66.85%-68.84%
Location: 68.59%-66.39%
Services: 65.54%-66.08%
General: 66.96%-69.76%
Value: 64.20%-60.13%

Suggestions for Improvement:
Cleaniness: Increase the focus on cleanliness and ensure it meets the highest standards. 
Amenities: Add more amenities to increase satisfaction and comfort of customers.
Location: Invest in making the location more accessible and efficient for customers.
Services: Improve customer service by making it more efficient and courteous.
General: Assess customer feedback and improve on areas that customers are not satisfied with.
Value: Improve the value offered by offering promotions and discounts.
